pages.text: This is a $(l:programming/conditions)Condition/$ widget.$(p)The $(thing)Drone Condition: Entity/$ widget allows you to check the entity this $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ is currently carrying. You can add an optional $(l:programming/text)Text/$ widget with an $(l:base_concepts/entity_filter)Entity Filter/$, to filter the entity to check for. With no $(thing)Text/$ widget, the condition will be true if $(italic)any/$ entity is carried.
